Résumé:
In the Omegaverse, everyone is born into one of three secondary genders: Alpha (α), Beta (β), or Omega (Ω). The majority of the population are Betas, while Alphas sit at the apex of society with their superior looks and abilities. Meanwhile, Omegas have a special characteristic: they periodically go into heat, at which time they become irresistible to Alphas.

Rino is an Omega, and a new recruit working for a digital travel magazine.
Chizu is an Alpha, and Rino's boss.

"Um, Boss! It's my first day, and..."

The moment Rino hears her boss's voice, she suddenly goes into an off-cycle heat!
Chizu respects the fact that Rino doesn't want to quit her job just because of her natural urges as an Omega and makes a decision to help her.

"Just bear with it. I'll get it over with soon."

Entranced by her cool fingers and sweet scent, Rino gives her body over to Chizu.
Fate begins to toy with the two as their feelings dance the fine line between reason and instinct...

FEATURES

[EXPERIENCE A NEW AGE OF EMPIRES]

Familiar elements from the classic Age of Empires games merged with brand-new and mobile-specific gameplay. Engage in rapid resource management, develop unique technologies, and train diverse armies to build and defend your kingdom from scratch.

[DOMINATE IMMERSIVE BATTLEFIELDS]

Participate in epic alliance battles with thousands of players worldwide in real-time combat within dynamic, interactive cities, for an authentic medieval battlefield experience on your mobile devices.

[BUILD MIGHTY CIVILIZATIONS]

Choose from 8 civilizations, the magnificent Chinese, the grandiose Romans, the elegant Franks, the glittering Byzantium, the mystical Egyptians, the solemn British, the exquisite Japanese, and the vibrant Koreans. Each civilization has its corresponding types of troops. With even more civilizations set to debut, experience the medieval era with high-definition graphics and richly detailed environments.

[USE REALISTIC WEATHER AND TERRAIN]

Explore and conquer a vast, vibrant, and realistic medieval world where the weather shifts unpredictably with the seasons. Various weather conditions and terrains will impact your strategic decisions. Torrential rains and droughts can alter the landscape, affecting troop movements. Lightning can damage your armies and structures, while fog obscures vision, hiding potential enemies. Skillfully harness the weather and terrain to enhance your battle effectiveness!

[COMMAND TROOPS & WEAPONS IN REAL TIME]

Lead up to five troops, maneuvering them freely across expansive maps and intense battlegrounds. Control a variety of powerful siege weapons such as trebuchets, alliance towers, battering rams, escalades, and airships to support your alliance in gaining the upper hand in fierce combat. Mastering the controls is crucial!

[DEPLOY LEGENDARY HEROES]

Select from over 40 epic heroes representing various civilizations. Legendary figures like Joan of Arc, Leonidas, and Julius Caesar are joined by intriguing new allies such as Miyamoto Musashi, Hua Mulan, and Rani Durgavati. Combine the unique attributes of these heroes and lead diverse troop types to create your own powerful and unique force!

Where each player pits a team of three, comprised of various playable versions of Dante, Nero, Lady, Vergil and Trish, against the demon hordes. Collect and use a mix of classic and new movesets for various weapons, as well as new skins for all characters.
Be the last train conductor roaming the postapocalyptic frozen world! Expand, strengthen, and build synergies on your train. The promised land beyond the toxic zone awaits you and your passengers.
Metal Ascension is a horde survival game with rogue-lite elements. Upgrade your mech with over 200 pieces and more than 1 000 000 combinations.

Fight giant War of the Worlds -style aliens invading Finland during a Winter in the 90's. Build an army of local townspeople in this chaotic semi-autobattler roguelike. Navigate through different biomes to obliterate the aliens from cosmic dimensions.
Angel at Dusk is a horror-based vertical shoot-'em-up, with enemy and boss designs inspired by the works of H.R. Giger.
Donald Barnes is a successful merchant who one day on his way home, starts being stalked by a dangerous demon from the Colonial Times. Now he has to find a way back home or finally defeat Mortisomem.

A Victorian steampunk RPG with tarot cards instead of dice. Investigate the disappearance of society’s most vulnerable to uncover a mysterious cult. Play as three characters, each with their own skills and motivations. Customize your characters with narrative choices to unlock new tarot cards.
Toxic Tomb is a free action platformer with the spirit of a SEGA Master System game.

An Spanish action and platformer game with the spirit of a SEGA Master System game.
Finish off the viscous menace of the Prykusa station.
Ravendawn
77th: The Game is an abstract representation of the experience of joining an online community. Walk through the community and solve the puzzles to progress as a community member.

A sci-fi game based on character dialogue and choices. Uncover the mysteries of Pioneer Station by attempting diplomacy and seeking peace or gunning through those that stand against you. The decisions you make will have an impact on the ending.

"No Case Should Remain Unsolved" is an investigative video game in which the player must solve an unsolved case by finding and analyzing fragments of memories from the past. You play as now-retired police detective Gyeong Jeon as she gathers clues and testimonies to uncover the truth behind the case of a missing girl.

Floomy is a challenging platformer with roguelite elements. The core essence of Floomy is obtaining mastery over tricky aerial maneuvers required to get from one platform to the other. While there aren't any checkpoints, each level is very short, and permanent upgrades make speedrunning a breeze.
New Cycle is a city building simulator set in a world devastated by a solar flare.

At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, the heroes were fighting for hegemony, and the flames were everywhere. In the game, players played the role of Zhao Yun, a well-known general of the Three Kingdoms, and interpreted the story of his youth.
- Dive into 12 complete story chapters
- Choose from 3 difficulty levels, with a minimum of 30 hours experience of main storyline.
- Master 4 distinct weapon systems: spears, bows and arrows, swords, and steeds, supplemented by equipment systems like crafting, sets, refinement, and enchantment.
- Explore no fewer than 30 expansive maps.
- Encounter dozens of well-known Chinese historical figures, who will either fight by your side or become your adversaries.
- Enjoy a wide range of visually striking outfits for the protagonist and companions.
- Engage in several large-scale, renowned battles that truly capture the essence of the Three Kingdoms atmosphere.

Plateformes: Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
Résumé: A hack and slash game where mastering the specifics of the six heroines and their five weapon types is the key to victory against hordes of enemies.

Your adventure continues in Gordian Rooms 2... The escape island game where you venture further into the mysteries of the Gordian Society! Challenge your wits and conquer every puzzle on the Isle of Lye!  The Isle of Lye is a specially constructed testing ground for the Gordian Society, and as fate would have it, you have ended up here.

It is up to you to rise to the challenge and find a way out of this place, all the while competing to become a full fledged member of this enigmatic organization.

A punishing, one-button platformer about escaping prison. Test your skills and intellect as you ascend a tower of hand-crafted challenges. Jump, fly, slide up walls, float in bubbles and perform somersaults; all with the press of a single button. Reach the paramount. Reach.

Little-Known Galaxy is a cozy single-player RPG space adventure full of friendly characters, exploration, crafting, and farming. Unlock the secret of a mysterious relic and complete your Star Alliance mission. What mysteries will it uncover? What kind of adventure lies ahead? And who will you meet along the way?

Publisher & Developer: Carbon & Kay

Remnant Records is a horror investigation game for 1 to 4 players. Explore places haunted by the dead, survive elaborate and unique ghosts and find out what happened to them through thousands of generated stories.
Kill monsters using your camera and solve puzzles as you try to survive Dracula himself in his castle in this retro-style survival horror game.

Evacuated from his hometown due to the dangerous bursts of dark energy, the ordinary citizen is trying to overcome and survive a series of events in a new reality, where living as a human being is not possible anymore. 3rd-person horror with fixed camera angles and retro-styled graphics.
Toribash Next is the sequel to Toribash, the award-winning turn-based sandbox fighting game, developed by Nabi Studios. More players and fighting, weapons and blood, and ultimately - more fun.
Darkcean is a survival horror game.
Macross: Shooting Insight is a shoot-'em-up title based on the Macross anime series.
A 4x game about recruiting heroes to stop the undead threat
Collect resources and establish a defense line before dark and then face countless enemies .
A mystery adventure game set in southern France in the 1970s.

Plateformes: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S
Résumé: The third chapter of Poppy Playtime available as stand alone game on consoles.

Join Postmouse on their very first journey to deliver mail in a treacherous world unfit for a tiny mouse. Explore the ruins, meet charming characters and solve puzzles on your way through an abandoned mansion in this free, student-made adventure - all in one small mouse-sized package!
A game where you have build a toilet so you can pee without wetting your pants.

You've woken up in the middle of the night and you've gotta pee. Get to the bathroom as fast as you can before you pee your pants.

You'll adventure through an atmospheric home, trying to find your way to your ultimate goal. The Bathroom.
You'll have to use your wits to solve puzzles, explore new areas, and try to survive.

With an advanced scared system that forces you to stay on your toes by pressing buttons as they appear.
A one-on-one fighter featuring a mostly anthropomorphic cast.
Project Demigod

Résumé: A new rhythm music game starring the songstresses of the Azure Striker Gunvolt series, Lumen, Lola, and Luxia singing 15 different songs. Follow the notes to the pounding beat and aim for a top score in this electrifying rhythm game!

"Tales of Spark" is a Hack & Slash Action RPG with an Eastern flair. Players assume the role of a young wandering swordsman, exploring the vast desert, seeking treasures, defeating powerful bosses, and even slaying gigantic celestial dragons.

Titre: Connected Hearts Cost of Beauty Collectors Edition
Résumé: Cindy is a young orphan who lives with a stepmother and stepsister, mourning her late father. She is almost used to her low status in the house, but things change with one overheard talk. Cindy discovers that her father is actually alive, and it’s her stepmom Rachel who merely hides him. Now is Cindy’s chance to save her dad by sneaking into the Town Hall to pick up one important letter. And how fortunate that there's a ball tonight! Meanwhile, the Mayor's son, Albert, is furious about his father not attending the ball he has arranged himself. But he has no idea that once he goes down to the party, he will meet her. The one and only… Help two lovebirds to meet and overcome all obstacles. Gather your wits for an unforgettable love story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

In the peaceful Koji Village, a wolf in sheep's clothing is hiding among its citizens, plotting to hunt you and your friends down. Complete various mini-game missions before he catches you, and team up with your friends to catch him! Work together or turn against each other to emerge victorious in this exciting tug-of-war of deception!

Free Tower Defense game with unique roguelike elements. Custom base building mechanics allow you to create your own base and maze with tiles earned after each wave. Unleash a variety of monsters, each with its own evolution path and unique skills, and evolve them into legendary creatures.
A Shrimp Based Bullet Heaven. Kill creatures, Level up & pick from 3 upgrades to unalive thousands more.

**Frogue** is a stylish turn-based action platformer with bits of roguelite, bullet hell and time manipulation. Dash through your enemies, freeze time and throw your sword to solve every situation in YOUR way.

 - Embark in a procedurally generated journey in **FROGUE**, a Roguelike Bullet Hell Platformer.
 - Dash to avoid bullet and kill your enemies!
 - Throw knifes to kill them at a distance.
 - Out of options? No problem, freeze time and make your own solution!
A free top-down brawler about an Italian man named Giove, who enlists the help of a cursed artifact to recover his love.

Take the role of Lula and explore a vibrant fantasy world as she journeys to discover the meaning of the Genie and fulfill her destiny! GENIE Reprise is an atmospheric fantasy adventure told through fully voiced poetry and 3D first-person exploration.

Clash II is a turn-based strategy game in a world steeped in ancient magic. Immerse yourself in its history and explore forgotten land full of magical creatures. Gather and train an army, expand your stronghold, upgrade your heroes! Lead one side of the conflict and decide the fate of the continent!
Maids protect Akiba by shooting down the hordes of zombies.
A underwater-themed Match 3 game published by Legacy Games.

X marks the spot! Follow the map and find hidden treasures. Play as a pirate on a quest to gather all the wackiest treasures. Shovel Pirate is a cute platformer game with fun puzzles, adorable characters, and clever traps to avoid.

The Doppelganger Detection Department (D.D.D.) needs you!

There is a vacancy for the doorman position in your building and since you need the money and can't find a job you have no choice.

It's 1955 and for unknow reasons doppelganers are more common than normal, so the D.D.D.  has taken action on the matter.

Your job will be to allow or deny the entry of the subjects who request entry to the building, it seems easy, but be careful, you can't overlook any detail because you could be food for doppelgangers.
A sequel to the indie 2D fighting game Yatagarasu: Attack on Cataclysm.

Titre: Christmas Stories The Legend of Toymakers Collectors Edition
Résumé:
A yuletide hidden-object story packed with Christmas spirit!
Welcome to the magical land of the Christmas elves! Young Fizzy is finally old enough to build toys in Santa's workshop, and he's gifted with a magic hammer passed down in his family through generations! He can't wait to get to work, but a mishap unleashes a pair of diabolical dolls bent on freezing the shop and destroying the Christmas spirit! You'll have to thwart these dastardly dollies and take back Christmas on your very first day of work! Don't be fooled by the adorable characters and yuletide atmosphere. This story is not for the faint of heart! Solve challenging puzzles, locate cleverly hidden objects, and save Christmas in this wild story full of Christmas cheer!
A retro-style first-person horror game set in a dark, decaying parallel dimension where people from our world are not welcome.

Titre: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III / Trails of Cold Steel IV
Résumé: A compilation of two remastered Trails of Cold Steel titles for PlayStation 5.
A 2D puzzle-platformer about finding your table on a date night, featuring cooperative play

Looking fo a challenge? Fly fast. Die a lot. Race against the timer. Master a bunch of racing tracks. Fly faster. Die a bit less. Set the fastest time. Be the best “Runner” on a planet that’s clearly not Earth… Or just enjoy a relaxing sunset while experiencing the freedom of flight.

**High-Speed Aerial Racing:**Soar through the alien skies at incredible speeds, weaving through energy rings suspended in the atmosphere. Master the art of precision flying as you navigate hairpin turns, tight corridors, and gravity-defying drops.

**Time Trial Challenge:**Race against the world in over 20 adrenaline fuelled time trial circuits. Every millisecond counts and only the most skilled pilots will conquer the leaderboard. Can you become the undisputed champion?

**Boost Through Ring Mastery: **Collect speed-boosting rings strategically placed throughout each circuit. Skilfully catching them sequentially not only adds to your speed but also avoids overheating of your flying unit.

**Changing weather conditions:**Adapt your flying skills to the changing weather system and the diverse lighting conditions.

**Alien World Exploration: **Immerse yourself in a visually stunning alien planet and its otherworldly landscapes and mysterious landmarks, Fly at your own leisure, free from the clock pressure.

**Unlockables:**Complete races/achievements to unlock more circuits and skin colours to fly with. Discover the planet's "secrets" to unlock the ultimate flying machine…

**Reward system:** based on performance (1/2/3 stars)

**Achievements**Over 60 Steam achievements
Beastwatch is a retro-style horror shooter in which you play a security guard working his first night in a slaughterhouse.
Ookas, Ooka Bing and Ooka Ping collect the great bananas in this puzzle platformer, featuring local co-op

Become an inspector examining causes of plane crashes. Visit the crash site, gather evidence and interrogate witnesses. Explain whether the accident was caused by independent factors or human errors.

Take on the character of an aircraft accident inspector and explain the causes of crashes. Travel to the crash sites, where you will have to:



* Secure the Crash Site



* gather Evidence



* create photographic documentation



Having collected the evidence, go to the hangar and solve the puzzle:

* inspect the aeroplane parts
* iinterview witnesses
* reconstruct the wreckage
* check the technical documentation


Discover whether the accident was caused by human error an unfortunate coincidence.

Plateformes: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S
Résumé:
Geometry Survivor is a rogue-lite auto shooter where you must survive for 20 minutes. Fight against waves of geometry ships, defeat their formations and survive the grid world.

**Features**

 - One hand gameplay: Use just one hand to control the direction of your ship

 - Auto-Shooter: Your weapons fire automatically, letting you concentrate on staying alive

 - Weapons: Each run allows you to get a unique combination of weapons

 - Credits: Earn credits and permanently unlock new upgrades

 - Enemies: Enjoy the multitude of enemies each with their own AI

 - 20 minutes of intense gameplay

 - Retro visuals and music straight from the 80s

Myth of Empires is a multiplayer war sandbox game featuring a high degree of freedom and multiple civilizations. Players must survive, craft, create, and lead troops in their quest to conquer PVE or PVP territory and build their own empire.

Titre: Shin-chan: Shiro and the Coal Town
Résumé: An adventure game where Shin-chan from Crayon Shin-chan spends his summer vacation exploring a rural village in the Akita Prefecture along with a mysterious place nearby known as Coal Town.

Unleash voxel warfare in 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far. Lead a modern military, build bases, unlock units, and attack in all-out war. Engage on land, sea and air in over two dozen missions, online skirmishes, or co-op. Easy to learn, a challenge to master.

Game based on the creepy pasta "The Russian Sleep Experiment", tells the story of an intern who needs to do his internship in a clinic in the Soviet Union, while an explosion occurs that leaves them without electricity. With a flashlight and the help of his supervisor he will try to escape without being devoured by the experiments.

It is necessary to collect the clues to obtain the key and thus level up until you leave the building without being touched by the Russian experiments that seek to devour you. Show your ingenuity to look for clues in the dark and your agility to dodge the experiments' attacks.

Dive into a chilling adventure where horror meets imagination in this first-person thriller. Picture yourself in a maze of puzzles, where the story unfolds based on how you see it. It's not just a game; it's your own twisted journey.
An adventure game set in a mysterious world filled with ancient ruins and captivating lore about a case involving a string of supernatural disappearances.

"Mimic Logic" is an automatically generated logic puzzle roguelike. Listen to the statements of the treasure chests, find the lying mimics, and open the rest of the treasure chests! Opening a mimic results in a game over.
Join Joseph and Angeli on a musical journey filled with quirky characters and perilous paths to uncover the depths of Melody Memorial!

Windowkill is a twin-stick shooter, but the game window itself is constantly closing in on you. Shoot the window edges to push it around your screen as you fight and dodge enemies and bosses in their own windows.
An action platformer featuring musical boss battles and cooperative play

Your world is under attack by a ruthless race of machines, and you are its only hope. Cast epic spells, summon minions or buildings, and destroy the enemy before they conquer your home in this action roguelite shoot'em up game!
Pocket Fishing is a fishing simulator for Nintendo Switch, released by Ultimate Games on February 26, 2024.

Settled on a dystopian future, Alone in the Crowd is a humorous puzzle simulation investigative thriller, where you use a weird variety of gadgets to satisfy this mysterious, self proclaimed friendly AI character.

Fofiño and Lily are always in pursue of fun, particularly boxes! We all know how much cats love boxes, no matter their size!
Now they've set up the perfect plan to their funniest play and it's up to you to turn it into reality!
Help them to move the boxes around in this puzzle adventure! ฅ^•ﻌ•^ฅ
Escape the Arcade is an interactive comic book featuring many puzzles.

Résumé:
The evil Empire is currently creating a doomsday army behind a veil of secrecy. However, they are no match for the Rebel Alliance's covert operations division. Your mission is to infiltrate the Empire and put an end to their plans for terror and domination.

Star Wars™: Dark Forces Remaster has been brought to life by the team at Nightdive Studios, fully remastered through its proprietary KEX engine, allowing the game to run on modern gaming devices at up to 4K resolution at 120FPS. New and returning players will enjoy Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster’s upgraded gameplay, high-resolution textures, enhanced lighting and rendering, and support for gamepads.
Stranded at an abandoned gas station in the middle of the desert. Losing your grip on reality. Dark rituals. Demonic pursuers. No escape.
A puzzle plataformer about screen loops.

Casual voxel city builder with procedural generation elements.

Amazing Weekend: Search and Relax offers a variety of unique and compelling mini-games and hidden-object puzzles! Complete games to unlock new levels and explore interesting new locations where you’ll go hiking, horseback riding, boating, and relaxing through a weekend of recreation! Take a break from the daily hustle and bustle with this incredible new way to relax and get inspired!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.
Return Alive is a Top-Down Post-Apocalyptic Looter Shooter set in the post-apocalyptic world where resources are scarce.
Athena Crisis a retro-themed turn-based strategy game with a multiverse-spanning campaign as well as competitive multiplayer.

Crux is a fast-paced single-player arena shooter roguelike, where you face waves of enemies, unique bossfights and earn powerful magic abilities across 13 arenas. Master your fluid movement, trusty arsenal and the power of the blood gods to reach the top of the CRUX Champions Leaderboard!

Titre: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Legends of the Zone Trilogy
Résumé: A bundle containing the console porting hd remastered versions of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl, S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky and S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat. Three immersive sim-lite Role-Playing FPSs coming together
Potions: A Curious Tale is an action RPG with a heavy focus on crafting.

A futuristic themed block game
A 3D shooter that places the player in the cockpit of a ship traveling through the bloodstream, fighting off viruses.
A relaxing home building game

"Exanimum: The Silent Call" is a first-person psychological horror game. In this chilling experience, you will find yourself confronting terrifying mysteries and chilling secrets.  The terrifying and bizzare events that happened to Jason and his daughter Jessica on the road to Greenfield town are dragging them into this eerie adventure, leading them into an unknown world. As Jason and Jessica venture deeper into the depths of the forest, an unsettling silence envelops their surroundings, the birds cease their songs, the fog thickens, and the rain intensifies. However, fear is silently approaching with every step they take, relentlessly pursuing them.

Stellar Settlers: Space Base Builder is a space city builder and colony simulation game set in uncharted space, where players manage and expand a colony on alien planets.
Each planet offers procedurally generated environments and challenges, requiring players to adapt by mining resources, managing colonies, and designing physics-based spaceships for escape.
A short cat adventure packed with curious characters, strange environments and good vibes.​ Climb, talk, fly and smack your way to places where no cat has ever gone before!
A cooperative trivia game in which a forest is repopulated by correctly answering questions
Have fun helping Corbid to overcome the mazes to be crowned champion. Eat, mix and shoot colors to solve the puzzles of Corbid! A Colorful Adventure, a cute 3D platformer for all audiences.
An enhanced remake of the obscure 1984 Japanese puzzle-platformer Uootoy.
A psychological horror game.
ROAD TO EXOTICS! is a casual racing game inspired by arcade classics: Road Fighter, Out Run, Zippy Race, and others.

Résumé: Escaping while doing the right thing for each place in four places.  Escape this place with items needed for the place, items that will help, and items that will allow you to do the right thing for the places!

Tactical dice-rolling roguelike combat. Take control of 5 heroes, each with their own unique dice. Fight your way through 20 levels of monsters and try to take on the final boss. If you lose a single fight you have to start over so be careful (and lucky!).
A hybrid RPG with real-time exploration and turn-based combat.
A remake of MICA Team's first real game, Codename: Bakery Girl.
Pilot deadly helicopter gunships, battle enemy forces and complete dangerous missions within a thrilling desert warzone!
A game about playing golf in 4D.
NES inspired platformer about a mole trying to light up an abandoned mine.
NES inspired platformer and follow-up to Froggo Swing 'n Grapple

Welcome to Town of Sins, the ultimate card game experience that will keep you hooked from start to finish. Debauchery, battles and collections are waiting for you! 

 In this captivating adventure, you find yourself in a town teeming with stunning ladies, yet with no recollection of how you got there. Your mission? Break free from this town’s grasp or risk succumbing to its charms forever.

Are you ready for an adventure in the quirkiest town ever? Welcome to Town of Sins!

Three, two, one - STEP ON IT! Anything goes in these races: Risky overtaking manoeuvres, shameless crashes and insane pile-ups. Hurtle through deep gorges, glittering diamond caves, icy polar regions and yawning canyons.  Dodge obstacles at full speed, catapult your vehicle over jumps and fire items at your opponents.

Give it your all, achieve your best time and win the trophy!

Command Mobile Outpost and take XEN Firearm to venture deep into the Signet surveillance off-limit area. Collect unique Weapon Units. Amp up the firepower of the Outpost that fights with you. This is an FTD game - FPS, Tower Defense, Base Building and much more all at the same time.

AutoForge is a 2D automation sandbox game where players. The game focuses on crafting complex production lines powered by Mana, expanding the base through the acquisition of materials, and venturing through procedurally generated landscapes.

Embark on a harrowing journey through the eerie corridors of Fancyland, an abandoned candy-themed indoor amusement park shrouded in mystery and darkness. Take on the role of Jackson Wright, a determined 22-year-old on a quest to uncover the truth behind his father's disappearance during a nightguard shift a decade ago.

As you step foot into the desolate halls of Fancyland, you'll soon realize that your investigation is not just a search for answers, but a desperate struggle for survival against a sinister force that lurks within.

Delve deep into the forgotten recesses of Fancyland as you navigate its long winding hallways, solve intricate puzzles, and unearth cryptic clues left behind by former employees. Every step you take brings you closer to unraveling the park's chilling secrets, but also closer to the malevolent entity that hunts you relentlessly. Keep your wits sharp and your senses keen as you evade detection and uncover the truth that lies buried beneath layers of deception and fear.

Will you emerge victorious and uncover the truth about your father and Fancyland's dark past, or will you become another missing victim of its long-kept mystery? Prepare to face your deepest fears as you embark on a heart-pounding adventure that will test your courage, intellect, and will to survive in this haunting tale of mystery and suspense.

Excellent and crispy PSX-styled graphics with a modern gameplay approach.

Like a dead man reanimated by dark sorcery, the necromancer simulator is back! Give the undead the ability to fly over mountains and swim across rivers, explore a fully generated world at night and fend off enemy hordes during the day. Start a new, uhm, life.

Become THE Trap Master - play your deck of lethal traps to mow down waves of bizarre creatures and protect your altars! Craft a unique deck of traps and powers, discover treasure of surprise effects, and guard a different base each time until you are ready for the unforgiving boss.
Physically accurate claw machine simulator! Win 200 unique prizes in the Fun or Realistic difficulty mode.
"Doll Impostor" is a horror game where you're the guardian of possessed dolls. Identify the impostor before 9 a.m. or face dire consequences. Every hour counts in this race against fear.

Destroy hordes of undead skeletons in this top-down roguelite arena shooter. In Hunchback's Dungeon, you play as a deformed, magic-wielding human who can control up to 4 different spells. Unlock new characters, collect unique items, equip powerful spells, and survive until the end.

**Features**

 - Become an ultimate spell caster, wielding up to 4 unique and powerful spells at the same time. The list of spells available in the game is growing
 - Really fast runs (20-30 minutes)
 - Unlock new characters, difficulties and items
 - Tons of items to power yourself up with
Rail Shooter x Caravan STG

Résumé: A bundle containing the remastered versions of Muv-Luv and Muv-Luv Alternative.

A tactical gun game with gacha elements. As the Architect, use the power of the Starseeds to restore the digital world before the Redshift finish destroy it.
A horror-themed exploration game by Stasis Booth Games.

Titre: A Divine Guide To Puzzle Solving
Résumé: ​A Divine Guide To Puzzle Solving is a narrative puzzle adventure that transports you to the realm of the gods. As a mere mortal chosen by the enigmatic puzzle deity Tobla, your task is to test a new collection of divine puzzles - though not entirely by your own free will, of course.  Your key to success is the ancient power of the Swap Beam, allowing you to swap object positions and solve Tobla's challenges.  Complete your task as a divine puzzle tester, and you may find your way back home.
Four dolls follow their owner Rico into the virtual "Unreal Planet" in this cooperative puzzle-platformer

On your way home on the train, you weren't paying attention. Until you realized the train had been stopping at the same station over, and over again. Watch out for anomalies, and avoid the Anomaly Exit! Made for single-player and 2-6 co-operative multiplayer.

Nope Challenge is a VR thrill ride where you tackle spine-tingling phobias - think clowns, spiders and dizzying heights - with a twist. Hit the Nope Button to jump from adrenaline-pumping action to a peaceful Breather Space. It's not just a heart-racing experience for players but also a hilarious spectacle for friends watching. Perfect for a fun, fear-conquering adventure!

An arcade successor to the classic NBA Jam series of hich-octane basketball games.

This is the unique nostalgia experience that Retrowave World wants to give to the player. Forget your job, forget the traffic jams, forget your problems... Imagine yourself living in this world filled with neon lights and nostalgia.

When listening to Synthwave / Retrowave / Vaporwave most people have had this feeling of nostalgia for a time that they did not know or that never existed.

The Retrowave is heavily inspired by the 80s, but is above all an idealized futuristic version of the 80s.

Whether you are nostalgic for your childhood, the good old days or simply for a time you have never known, Retrowave World will offer the player the unique experience of being able to be immersed in this wonderful universe for at least a few moments. ..

Alone, with friends or with strangers explore the incredible universe of Retrowave World.

Drive your car through the different worlds, stop at the VHS store to see the latest releases, take a trip to the arcade to try to break the record on your favorite game, go to the Synth Shop to buy the cassette of the latest fashionable group, make deliveries and earn money, challenge other players in ever crazier races... The possibilities are numerous...

Retrowave World offers above all a visual and sound experience that will delight fans of the genre and will surely introduce this wonderful universe to those who do not know it yet...

Random elite and super elite monsters
It's not just the bigger boss fights that might be difficult for the adventurers. All minions in the lair can be an elite or super elite version of themselves, posing great risks to anyone not giving them the proper respect.

Permadeath and metaprogression power system
Every death in Margoq's Lair is permanent; however, you earn souls during each run which can be used to gain permanent perks and unlock additional content such as new classes, making you progressively more powerful and the gameplay progessively more varied.

Discover an immersive ocean Eco-Sim where you can be almost any animal under the sea! From a tiny seahorse to a massive blue whale, experience the endless circle of life in a massive world of reefs, shipwrecks, and hidden wonders.
Square-Enix and Blaze Retro bring back the Legacy of Kain series for a compilation of the first two titles.

Completing missions and earning medals and certificates leads to receiving an agent license, with players evaluated based on their efficiency and accuracy.

Ark II starring Vin Diesel.

A first-person reimagining of the 2017 third-person adventure game *Forever Space*.

A psychological survival horror game set in an eerie, isolated 90’s Polish town consumed by an ominous presence. You’ve come looking for answers, but everyone seems possessed by something foul. Explore the festering town, interrogate locals and fight ungodly manifestations to get to the truth.

With RPG elements, the gameplay focuses on strategic estimation and numerical calculations.
The "Debating Sim" returns! Engage famous philosophers of all stripes, challenge their ideas, and change the world— or just tell everyone they smell terrible. NONSENSE!

Explore, build and expand in this god game of tiny proportions! Find the resources you need to set up settlements and upgrade your fire until it becomes the Sun!

Enter a futuristic world of robots and advanced AI in Simulakros, a fast-paced third-person shooter with rogue-lite elements. The CORP seeks to develop the ultimate weapon: the Simulakros unit. It's up to you and a mysterious hacker to disrupt their plans, by turning their deadly combat androids against them. Can two people take down the world's biggest corporation?

Turn-based, solo character roleplaying adventure set in a flooded research facility. This is a classic console-style RPG with an emphasis on exploration.

Can you help Catherine rescue her friends in a terrifying new case?

No sooner do they arrive than a terrible sorcerer named Barlow kidnaps George and Shen, leaving Catherine to fight her way through a twisted, haunting version of the museum to discover Barlow’s plans, stop him, and save her friends! Help Catherine follow the clues, crack the case, and defeat evil itself in this chilling Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game!
Konami returns to the Professional Baseball Spirits (Pro Yakyū Spirits) series for the 2024-2025 season.

Arch Legends is a classic third-person RPG featuring real-time combat, where players can select from various vocations and abilities, each offering unique advantages and challenges. Summon allies to tackle tougher enemies and earn greater rewards. Join a guild to embark on special quests, gaining experience and unlocking exclusive rewards that can be exchanged for rare items. With powerful forces rising, the Kingdom of Evereska depends on you to vanquish the darkness.

Nightdive Studios and Ziggurat Interactive have teamed up to bring back this sophisticated shooter laced with gallows humor and visual violence to bestow mayhem to all! Puzzle solving and strategic thinking are placed at a premium. The visceral violence is complemented by paranormal graphics and a super(natural) storyline. 

Journey into a mansion on the Island of Matinicus where you'll arrive to find the mansion full of hellacious demonic creatures. Solve deadly puzzles, uncover the secrets behind a famous mystery and discover an ancient artifact from the Pharaoh Ramses, if you can live long enough to find it.

Another collection of two games similar to the Pretty Girls mini-games series, only this time featuring the Pretty Boys on a single Switch cart. The bundle includes Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Dropout! and Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Breakup!.

Attract cats with food and then watch them romp with your toys! More than 40 varieties of cats—white and black, tabby and calico—might stop by. Rare cats are rumored to roam the neighborhood too, but you'll need particular items to entice those elusive felines. Each visitor is logged in your Catbook. Become a master kitty collector and fill it up!
The Children of Clay is a short stop motion archeology horror game, where you have to study an ancient artefact and discover its dark secret.

Worshippers of Cthulhu is a real-time strategy game where players lead a cult, balancing city-building, rituals, and follower devotion to awaken eldritch deities. The game features resource management, interactions with Lovecraftian entities, and a blend of supernatural and strategic gameplay.
Investigate a public library and dig deeper into mystery of the Amanda the Adventurer cartoon in this first-person puzzle horror game.

A mobile baseball title from Konami.

Given possession of a cursed briefcase, you must find a way out of the densely-crowded city while being stalked by a shapeshifting entity.

Franchise Hockey Manager returns for its 11th version in 2024-25 with plenty of additions to the deepest, most authentic hockey strategy gaming experience you can find. Choose from teams around the globe and select a team to guide to glory, including a chance at the ultimate prize, the Stanley Cup.

King's Orders is a simplified historical strategy game with an important innovation. You command your armies by sending letters with orders. Messengers with these letters travel the land and can be lost or intercepted. Generals execute orders upon receipt and send you reports the same dangerous way.
I have some memories of saying goodbye that I don't want to forget, so I turned them into 11 minigames and backed them up in this collection.

Survive the night by finding batteries and evading hunters. But beware: any scream, gasp, or squeak into your microphone restarts the game! Time only moves when you do, so keep moving. See who in your group can stay quiet the longest! MICROPHONE REQUIRED!

Scream, gap, or even whimper into your microphone, and the game restarts. Welcome to DON'T SCREAM! – an Unreal Engine 5 horror experience inspired by '90s camcorder found footage. The challenge is simple: survive a night in the Forest without screaming or dying.

Sounds easy, right? But there's a catch. Time only progresses as you move, and the scares are unpredictable. With dozens of dynamic scares and many locations and relics to discover, each playthrough offers a unique and terrifying experience. Every step you take could be your last... so keep your eyes open and your wits about you. It's the perfect game to scare the pants off your friends and family!
Experience rage-inducing precision platforming as a recently deceased soccer player damned to Inferno! Kick your sibling's soul out of Hell for your chance at redemption!

Titre: Hidden Capybaras with Orange and Pumpkins: Spooky Halloween Edition
Résumé: Celebrate Halloween night with cute capybaras with orange! Find all the hidden capybaras in their Halloween costumes and light up the town on this magical night. A fun-filled adventure awaits you!

Delve into Keeper’s Toll, an action-packed roguelite brimming with challenge and despair. Survive against an onslaught of relentless hordes and grueling bosses with skill-based ARPG gameplay. Embrace the darkness and cleanse these cursed lands.
The 16-bit nightmare returns. Survive, hide, and avoid the deadly Scissorman in this legendary horror classic.

Plateformes: Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S
Résumé: A platformer based on the Monster High line of spooky fashion dolls, where you can customize your own monster girl and work with the Boo Crew to solve the school's strange secrets.

Titre: Gloomy Tales Hotel Frightsylvania Collectors Edition
Résumé:
You've been invited to a private party, but this isn’t your average celebration. The shadows of the ancient castle hide dark secrets, and you’ll need your wits to survive the night.

Prepare to dance till you’re dead in this horrifying yet captivating experience! A mysterious benefactor invites you to a private party... in Romania! Exciting, isn't it? Well, Annabelle is positively ecstatic, so all you can do now is pack your largest suitcase and print out the plane tickets. Make sure you don't forget your Halloween costume, though! A shimmering light in the dark mountains leads you to a gloomy castle. Welcome to Frightsylvania Hotel – your home away from home, where comfort meets mystery and luxury intertwines with secrets. Maybe a few monsters and death traps as well. Wander through the labyrinth of looming halls and underground tunnels and don't mind the itchy feeling in the back of your head like someone's watching you. Because they are…

Step into the shoes of a martial arts master in a thrilling survivor-like roguelite inspired by action movies of the ‘80s. Use the environment and improvised weapons, master new techniques, and create devastating combos to fight off relentless goons and bandits! Karate Survivor delivers intense, fast-paced combat where improvisation and creativity are key to surviving the streets.

 - **Improvised Combat**. Use whatever you can get your hands on to defeat your enemies. From plastic flamingos to mop handles, even a child's toy hammer can be deadly in the right hands.
 - **Environmental Warfare**. Manipulate your surroundings to your advantage. Push objects at enemies, bring down scaffolding, or slam them with a microwave door.
 - **Dynamic Combos**. Dozens of different attacks allow you to create unique combinations of up to six attacks, tailored to your fighting style. Experiment and discover the most effective combos.
 - **Progression and Mastery.** Collect experience to unlock and master new permanent techniques and skills between runs, making each playthrough more rewarding.
 - **Diverse Locations and Boss Battles**. Battle through various areas, each with its own distinct features and items for combat. Face powerful bosses in each location, testing your skills to the limit.
 - **Fast-Paced Runs.** Immerse yourself in rapid, intense street battles. Test your martial arts skills and survival instincts in action-packed showdowns that pay homage to the adrenaline-fueled scenes of action movies, ensuring you're always on the edge of your seat.

Fight fast, precisely, and without remorse.

Set in a surreal, retro-inspired world of memories, Hannah, a young girl, navigates a twisted vision of her 1980s childhood to uncover the mystery of her nightmares. With an emphasis on psychological storytelling, players explore eerie environments, solve intricate puzzles, and encounter unsettling visuals and sounds. In this short visual novel, make choices and answer the question: is love a zero-sum game?

A narrative-driven indie RPG featuring turn-based combat and character progression through futuristic implant technology. Set in a dystopian world in 2034, players follow the story of Ramhart, a fighter navigating a world of conflict and intrigue. Engage in tactical battles while uncovering the events shaping this atmospheric and compelling setting.

A single-player, tactical deck-building card game that combines strategy and RPG elements. Players craft decks to overcome increasingly challenging levels, utilizing strategic gameplay to succeed. Players unravel the twisted motivations of the killer while evading an ambitious detective. An adventure from award winning MMORPG designer Andrew Gower. It is an enchanting point-and-click style RPG with hundreds of hours of gameplay, set in a land of magic and mysteries, with a huge number of professions to try.

Explore 17th century Canadian wilderness through the eyes of Jeanne, a French woman who crossed the Atlantic to start anew and Maikan, an Innu hunter trying to discover what’s disturbing the forest. Your choices will shape the traits of the protagonists in this narrative single-player experience.
An RTS-style RPG with gacha elements. As the new CEO of S.E.E.D. players must command multiple units to defend their base while uncovering a conspiracy that threatens the world.
A small-scale tactical RPG with an American retro urban horror theme, designed by a Chinese dev team.

Embark on a journey looking for redemption, truth and your freedom, on a continent filled with challenges to be overcome, with main and side quests that will provide you with various unique and powerful equipments and skills.

Tricky Madness is a snowboarding game heavily inspired by SSX and 1080º.

Slash, Shoot and Break demons. Capture their spirits and summon them out into your battle in the beautiful yet dangerous world of Inferno. Fight against hordes of demons and stop the evil queen with the power of the Spirit Mancer.

Seven Deadly Sins. Have you heard about the 8th? Delve into madness in Sin Slayers, a challenging RPG Roguelite where you decide how much sin to bear as you transform the world. Assemble a party of wicked adventurers, kill, and pillage to drive off a gluttonous nightmare in turn-based battles.

Trombone Champ: Unflattened lets you control the slide and blow your way through VR trombone-playing madness. Slide your arm, hit those pitches, and revel in the chaos of becoming the world’s first virtual trombone virtuoso. Based on the BAFTA-nominated, viral original! 🔥🎺

Yuuna, our protagonist and mentally ill NEET,  spends most of her days browsing forums about her favorite anime, Ai no Uta ★ Tenshi Senshi 𝄞. One day she stumbles across an ad claiming to have a desktop assistant modeled after Ai, the main character of Ai no Uta.

Unable to resist the allure of talking with her favorite character, Yuuna downloads the program. Ai-chan turns out to be the girlfriend Yuuna’s always dreamed of– but can a relationship with no boundaries really flourish? Can an AI program actually feel real human love?

Welcome to Midori no Kaori, a relaxing cozy game that allows you to create your own Japanese shop and manage customers. There are no winners or losers here, just unleash your creativity and enjoy a unique experience.
Twelve additional Data East classic arcade titles for the Evercade.

Become Mia, a paranormal detective searching for her missing father inside the Perimeter - a place that doesn't exist. Investigate clues like a real detective and unravel the mysteries behind the Enigma of Fear, defeating the terrible monsters who'll try to stop you.
Casual & Hard FPS. Be careful with jam.

Welcome to the perilous nuclear-contaminated waters, where all creatures are mutating. Start as an ordinary small fish, struggling to survive in this toxic sea. Through continuous evolution and adaptation, you will grow into a powerful ocean monster and ultimately become the sole ruler of this ocean

In this game, players will take on the role of a small, fledgling creature whose goal is to evolve into a giant in the deep sea by absorbing radiation and devouring competitors. Players can customize the evolution path of the sea monster according to their preferences, and each choice will affect the shape and ability of the sea monster. With the deepening of the game, players will witness their own sea monster from insignificant fish, to the ruler of the ocean, this process is not only full of achievement, but also endless fun to explore the unknown.

Enemies in the game are not static, but randomly mutate as the environment changes and the game progresses, creating unpredictable challenges for the player. Each game is a new experience and players will face different enemies and challenges, which requires players to constantly adapt to the environment and flexibly adjust their tactics. This random variation mechanism not only increases the complexity of the game, but also simulates the unpredictability of nature, making every game experience unique to the player.

New experience in Exploration Mode: The game introduces a new exploration mode with ten different levels. Players need to complete these levels, collect new mutations, unlock new evolutionary paths, and further enrich their sea monster to become a true Lord of the deep sea.
Subliminal is a psychological horror/puzzle game inspired by the urban legend of The Backrooms.

After a long day at work, all you want is to relax on the couch—but the night has other plans. Step into the shoes of Stefan, a Romanian engineer, at the local parts manufacturing plant.  It’s the mid-2000s, and after another exhausting shift, all you want is to unwind on the couch with your loyal companion, Mustard, an orange cat that’s been with you for years. The neighborhood outside is quiet, just as it always is.

But tonight is different...

As you drift off to sleep in front of the TV, strange dreams haunt you. Then, suddenly, you’re jolted awake by a knock at the door. Confusion sets in—there’s no one there. Something isn’t right, but you can’t put your finger on it.

The streets look the same as always, but a strange, eerie stillness hangs in the air, as if something unnatural is lurking just beyond sight. You feel watched. Something is out there—something dangerous.

A free-to-play fantasy MMORPG, powered by the Ethereum Blockchain.
